summary: Wat Phrasri Rattana Sasadaram or Wat Phra Kaew, the "Temple of the Emerald Buddha", is one of the most sacred Buddhist temples in Thailand.
full_text: The Emerald Buddha  is considered the palladium of the Kingdom of Thailand. It is a figurine of the meditating Buddha seated in yogic posture, made of a semi-precious green stone , clothed in gold, and about 26 inches  tall. It is housed in the Temple of the Emerald Buddha  on the grounds of the Grand Palace in Bangkok.
title: Emerald Buddha
